full_text: @aivanopoulos Great article :) have recently found that a https://t.co/8V1R6WBtA6 board created at the start of a sprint where people can jot their thoughts in the moment means the retro runs a bit more efficiently than trying to remember everything that happened

@IR_oldie @TheWebConf These systems that solicit reviews after publication are interesting, would probably empower researchers to explore more ambitious agendas while removing the COI of reviewing to a conf you're publishing in to meet acceptance rate https://t.co/9OYU5CNdVy
@OlegZendel I nominate rank-biased precision for a test of time award ðŸ˜‰
@aivanopoulos @LordGrimdark :( only Australia Post manages to deliver my stuff to the wrong address often enough too

@aivanopoulos @LordGrimdark Toll have no idea where anything is and can't reliably tell you when anything might arrive, and yet stuff gets delivered eventually. It's Agile story estimation in a different context
